document_data.name: Chromatic Ray
document_data.mainbody: '''''Chromatic ray''''' was a spell used by [[blackguard]]s and evil [[cleric]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell was mainly used against good-aligned [[dragon]]s and other dragonkind. When cast, the spell unleashed a bright, powerful multicolored ray at a target. If the targeted dragon failed to defend itself, it temporarily lost the ability to use its innate magical abilities.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] component.
